sentence.Network_en: The company is run jointly by a triumvirate of directors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司是由叁人组成的董事会经管的.

sentence.Network_en: Run by fractious triumvirate, it produced some noble plays.
sentence.Network_cn: 由独断专行的三人小组经营该剧团演出了一些名剧.

sentence.Network_en: Lepidus, a general who joined them in a triumvirate, had little power and eventually retired.
sentence.Network_cn: 加人了三头同盟的李必达没有什么权力, 最后只好引退.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...second straight championship run直的, 笔直的  连续的;triumvirate三人执政,三头政治,三头统治,三人执政的政治roll out铺开; 碾平
恺撒、庞培和克拉苏的前三头同盟（ triumvirate ）在公元前54年破裂，其时加图当选为执政官（praetor）。加图和元老院的贵族派（ …
...到公元476年罗马处于帝国时期。在罗马由共和向帝制转变的过程中，中间有一种过渡形态。这就是前后两次“三头政治”(triumvirate)。前三头同盟：庞培(Pompey)、克拉苏(Crassus)、凯撒(Caesar)。两头并立，凯撒独.
fact or FICTION : the 2008 playoffs mark ascendance of a new West triumvirate of Los Angeles , New Orleans and Utah .事实还是幻想：2008年季后赛标志着西部新的三巨头湖人、黄蜂和爵士正式登场？

list.abs: But the triumvirate outsmarted the generalissimo ., 但是这三位却比蒋介石棋高一着.

list.exp: 三头政治中的执政者之一
list.abs: socialist社会主义者  splinter group(party)分裂出来的组织(党)  think tank智囊团  triumvir三头政治中的执政者之一  Utopian空想家  white supremacist白种人.
triumphantly 成功地triumvir 三执政官triumvirate 三人执政
But the triumvirate outsmarted the generalissimo ., 但是这三位却比蒋介石棋高一着.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin triumviratus, from triumvir (see triumvir)

entry.tran: 三人工作组；（尤指）三人领导小组，三巨头
entry.def: A triumvirate is a group of three people who work together, especially when they are in charge of something.

example.ex: ...the triumvirate of women who worked together on the TV dramatisation of the novel.
example.tran: 合作把这部小说搬上电视的三位女负责人

means.word_mean: 1. a group of three men responsible for public administration or civil authority

auth_sentence.content: His animation expertise is one reason he is in the DreamWorks SKG triumvirate.
